description:
Custom Rich Presence (playing status) manager for Discord. Features run on startup and minimizing to tray.


- Happy 2025 everyone!
- Updated Arabic, Bulgarian, Swiss German (new translator, Noah Pombas), Spanish (new translators, samykat1 and Santiago), Persian (new translator, Nythsha), Indonesian, Japanese, Georgian (new translator, blessed), Korean, Malay, Portuguese (new translator, Noah Pombas) and Thai.
